title: (x) "Invisible Children" hand printed scratchy script - hand written {gang}
content:
I’m making a poster for this organization and i need to match the font but know seems to know its name.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080917im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Invisible%20Children2%20copy_5209.jpg)

 [‹ Help me identify this typeface please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44032 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sara Delphi ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080925080917/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44027 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thestriped1

comments.content: Is it a typeface? Three i’s are different, as are two e’s.
Get in touch with the producers of the project and I’m sure they can steer you toward the person who lettered the original.
i was affraid it was hand written, thanks for the help

Well it wouldn’t be too difficult to replicate the style.

Nick Cooke
